00392     class _OgreExport SkeletonPtr : public SharedPtr<Skeleton> 
00393     {
00394     public:
00395         SkeletonPtr() : SharedPtr<Skeleton>() {}
00396         explicit SkeletonPtr(Skeleton* rep) : SharedPtr<Skeleton>(rep) {}
00397         SkeletonPtr(const SkeletonPtr& r) : SharedPtr<Skeleton>(r) {} 
00398         SkeletonPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<Skeleton>()
00399         {
00400             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00401             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00402             {
00403                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00404                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00405                 pRep = static_cast<Skeleton*>(r.getPointer());
00406                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00407                 if (pUseCount)
00408                 {
00409                     ++(*pUseCount);
00410                 }
00411             }
00412         }
00413 
00415         SkeletonPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00416         {
00417             if (pRep == static_cast<Skeleton*>(r.getPointer()))
00418                 return *this;
00419             release();
00420             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00421             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00422             {
00423                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00424                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00425                 pRep = static_cast<Skeleton*>(r.getPointer());
00426                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00427                 if (pUseCount)
00428                 {
00429                     ++(*pUseCount);
00430                 }
00431             }
00432             return *this;
00433         }
00434     };
00435 
00437     struct LinkedSkeletonAnimationSource
00438     {
00439         String skeletonName;
00440         SkeletonPtr pSkeleton;
00441         Real scale;
00442         LinkedSkeletonAnimationSource(const String& skelName, Real scl)
00443             : skeletonName(skelName), scale(scl) {}
00444             LinkedSkeletonAnimationSource(const String& skelName, Real scl, 
00445                 SkeletonPtr skelPtr)
00446                 : skeletonName(skelName), pSkeleton(skelPtr), scale(scl) {}
00447     };
00448 }
